title: Mon-Soni! D'Artagnan no Idol Sengen (MSonic!)
synopsis: When D'Artagnan went to Tokyo for a little fun, she spotted an unforgettable sight: Lucifer singing while basking in moonlight in a park. From that moment, no matter if she was asleep or awake, D'Artagnan's heart would not stop throbbing for some reason.
related_anime: ['Monster Strike Anime', 'Wishing', 'Mon-Soni!: Senritsu no Lucifer, Tada Hitotsu no Hajimari no Uta']
staff: [['Katou, Youichi', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Hikasa, Youko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['MONACA', ['Music']], ['Sunamura, Teppei', ['Planning']]]
